con:restRequest.name: Create_Notif
con:restRequest.con:request:
{"d":{"results":[{"__metadata":{"id":"https://dispatcherwb0ceb360.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/SMP_NG_WEB/odata/svt/notification_srv/Items(guid'00505694-41ce-1ed7-b0da-c7175f0b40fa')","uri":"https://dispatcherwb0ceb360.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/SMP_NG_WEB/odata/svt/notification_srv/Items(guid'00505694-41ce-1ed7-b0da-c7175f0b40fa')","type":"/SVT/NOTIFICATION_SRV.Item"},"Id":"00505694-41ce-1ed7-b0da-c7175f0b40fa","Title":"New Invitation from aPaul Pharma - Action Required","Subtitle":"","Description":"

The SAP customer aPaul Pharma has requested for your S-user S0016676329 to be linked to the SAP support account of  aPaul Pharma for the purposes of managing incidents related to their SAP installations.

By accepting this customers invitation, you grant permission for SAP to share the following contact details with  aPaul Pharma.
-First Name Last Name of S-user
-Email Address
-Country
-Partner Company Name

To accept invitation please go to Service Partner User Cockpitapplication by clicking on the button below \"Show in application\".

If you have received this notification by mistake, please contact shengjie.deng@sap.com.

","Link":"https://supportshell-wb0ceb360.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/#SPUC","Counter":0,"Priority":"Low","Timestamp":"\/Date(1509961106000)\/","Username":"S0016676329","Application":"SPUC","Reference":"0050569441CE1ED7B0DAC7175F08E0FA","Language":"E"},{"__metadata":{"id":"https://dispatcherwb0ceb360.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/SMP_NG_WEB/odata/svt/notification_srv/Items(guid'00505694-41ce-1ed7-b0da-df71d621a0fa')","uri":"https://dispatcherwb0ceb360.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/SMP_NG_WEB/odata/svt/notification_srv/Items(guid'00505694-41ce-1ed7-b0da-df71d621a0fa')","type":"/SVT/NOTIFICATION_SRV.Item"},"Id":"00505694-41ce-1ed7-b0da-df71d621a0fa","Title":"New Invitation from aPaul Pharma - Action Required","Subtitle":"","Description":"

The SAP customer aPaul Pharma has requested for your S-user S0016676329 to be linked to the SAP support account of  aPaul Pharma for the purposes of managing incidents related to their SAP installations.

By accepting this customers invitation, you grant permission for SAP to share the following contact details with  aPaul Pharma.
-First Name Last Name of S-user

con:config.script:
def testCase = context.getTestCase()
Date date = new Date() String today = date.format("yyyyMMdd")
Date nextDay = date + 30 String expireday = nextDay.format("yyyyMMdd")
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Valid_From",today) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Valid_To",expireday)

con:assertion.name: Load invitation from Partner Hans Ammer
Return granted auth details from partner

con:config.script:
def testCase = context.getTestCase()
Date date = new Date() String today = date.format("yyyyMMdd")
Date nextDay = date + 30 String expireday = nextDay.format("yyyyMMdd")
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Valid_From",today) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Valid_To",expireday)

<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
def testCase = context.testCase def currentProject = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project
def callingTestSuiteService = currentProject.testSuites['SPU_APITest'] def Guid = callingTestSuiteService.properties['GUID'].value testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("GUID_INVI",Guid)
